meanings.sent1: She painted the picture amateurishly, with little experience.
meanings.sent2: He played the piano amateurishly, hitting the wrong keys often.
meanings.sent3: The chef cooked the dish amateurishly, but it still tasted good.
meanings.sent4: The team performed amateurishly, like beginners in a professional league.
meanings.sent5: The dancer moved amateurishly across the stage, trying her best.

meanings.definition: Done in a way that lacks skill or expertise
meanings.sent1: The amateurishly made cake was lopsided and uneven.
meanings.sent2: His amateurishly written essay had many spelling errors.
meanings.sent3: The amateurishly built birdhouse fell apart after a day.
meanings.sent4: The amateurishly designed website was difficult to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The amateurishly sewn dress had crooked seams and loose threads.
